Card.Name: Flood
Card.RulesText: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

Card.Name: Disrupt
Card.RulesText: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}. Draw a card.

Card.Name: Snap
Card.RulesText: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Untap up to two lands.

Card.Name: Daze
Card.RulesText: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

Card.Name: Counterspell
Card.RulesText: Counter target spell.

Card.Name: Propaganda
Card.RulesText: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

Card.Name: Tinker
Card.RulesText: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for an artifact card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Fact or Fiction
Card.RulesText: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

Card.Name: Treachery
Card.RulesText: Enchant creature When Treachery enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands. You control enchanted creature.

Card.Name: Palinchron
Card.RulesText: Flying When Palinchron enters the battlefield, untap up to seven lands. {2}{U}{U}: Return Palinchron to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Mahamoti Djinn
Card.RulesText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

Card.Name: Cursed Totem
Card.RulesText: Activated abilities of creatures can't be activated.

Card.Name: Tsabo's Web
Card.RulesText: When Tsabo's Web enters the battlefield, draw a card. Each land with an activated ability that isn't a mana ability doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

Card.Name: Junk Diver
Card.RulesText: Flying When Junk Diver dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Nevinyrral's Disk
Card.RulesText: Nevinyrral's Disk enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

Card.Name: Monkey Cage
Card.RulesText: When a creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Monkey Cage and create X 2/2 green Monkey creature tokens, where X is that creature's mana value.

Card.Name: Karn, Silver Golem
Card.RulesText: Whenever Karn, Silver Golem blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -4/+4 until end of turn. {1}: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value until end of turn.

Card.Name: Urza's Armor
Card.RulesText: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

Card.Name: Teeka's Dragon
Card.RulesText: Flying; trample; rampage 4 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+4 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

Card.Name: Faerie Conclave
Card.RulesText: Faerie Conclave enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {1}{U}: Faerie Conclave becomes a 2/1 blue Faerie creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.

Card.Name: Rath's Edge
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Rath's Edge deals 1 damage to any target.

Card.Name: City Of Traitors
Card.RulesText: When you play another land, sacrifice City of Traitors. {T}: Add {C}{C}.
